title: Something went Wrong?
body:
can't create lobby? 
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} *Something unexpected happened while trying to create your lobby*

replies.body:
Hey folks

Thanks for the heads up - we're on the case!

Cheers
Mindstar

Everything should be fixed now.

The cause was a backend update which caused lobby creation to break - meaning nobody could get in game.  We've rolled it back and it should all be smooth sailing now.  

Sorry for the interruption to your morning games.

Cheers
Mindstar
No one can Create a game :/ something is buggy RIOT! Response would be great

this might have something to do with it?  
https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce
It states there will be downtime tomorrow morning at 3am, there should be no issues right now.
We can create our own custom games but any matchmaking isn't working
